alert.note: Alert for Culebra; Vieques (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 4:30PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact Vieques and Culebra, Saint John and Saint Thomas Islands through 415 PM AST... At 329 PM AST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from 14 miles south of St John to 16 miles southeast of Vieques, and moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
